data.answer: Heating a solution of CuCl and 4-ethynylpyridine in pyridine under oxygen atmosphere

data.answer: The nature of the guest molecule enclathrated in the pores affects the distinct magnetic behaviour of the host system.

data.question: Is the porosity of the frameworks in compounds 1 and 2 larger in comparison with other SCO clathrates?
What is the role of the bpb ligand in the structure of compounds 1 and 2?
data.answer: The bpb ligand adopts a bent conformation, influencing the geometry of the framework and the coordination spheres of the FeII ions.
